source: TIHKAL: Tryptamines I Have Known And Loved
author: Alexander & Ann Shulgin

quotes.quote: How long will this last, this delicious feeling of being alive, of having penetrated the veil which hides beauty and the wonders of celestial vistas? It doesn't matter, as there can be nothing but gratitude for even a glimpse of what exists for those who can become open to it.
The nature of a breakthrough is that you cannot plan for it. The true breakthrough must be unexpected, or it is merely a continuation of what has gone before.
I believe that the realm of knowledge of states of mind and consciousness is far more central and important than the knowledge of physics.
A person who experiences life passionately will be nurtured by it, and a person who treats the world with love will have it returned to him, tenfold.
